snippet: For about a decade, the band has been one of the most innovative and popular acts in the flooded-with-talent and always-in-flux world of K-pop.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews performance by K-pop boy band BigBang at Prudential Center in Newark.
lead_paragraph: For about a decade, the band has been one of the most innovative and popular acts in the flooded-with-talent and always-in-flux world of K-pop.

headline.main: Review: BigBang, Following the K-Pop Playbook With Flash
headline.print_headline: Following the K-Pop Playbook, With Flash
